name: Island Puzzle
description:
https://jogosonlineapps.com.br/game/island-puzzle

WELCOME TO THE FUNNIEST JUNGLE PUZZLE ADVENTURE GAME! Start an exciting adventure in the cutest jungle puzzle matching game! Help the brave pilot and charming cat Tom survive on a desert island. Restore and decorate different areas in the island, get to the bottom of the secrets it holds, and enjoy the company of amusing in-game characters. What are you waiting for? Indulge yourself and become the hero of a brand new story. Build your dream island for free! Search for rare and unique artifacts by playing with curious pets, connecting them together in lines as long as possible. Play with
